channel.title: [solved] opening beta .vmf file in stable version of Hammer
channel.description: So I was working on a map in Hammer while I had the beta version installed. But now the stable version's Hammer will crash upon opening the .vmf file. Is there any way to convert the map file or do I have to wait until the next major update before publishing it on the workshop?

item.title: [solved] opening beta .vmf file in stable version of Hammer
item.dc:creator: djcj
item.description:
Disabling some point entities and triggers made it possible to load it in the previous Hammer version.

Read full topic
item.source: [solved] opening beta .vmf file in stable version of Hammer
